sport.title: The night Kobe said goodbye to NBA with 60 points
sport.author: Dave Schilling
sport.content: "I went to go put my hand out for a handshake, to be professional, because that's what I do. He looks at me with this face like, 'Are you kidding me? A handshake?' He goes 'Come here' and he gives me a hug. As a media member, I'm not going to go hug Kobe, but it tells you what a moment that is."
